description: Users may notice that the autofill functionality in Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based) fails to work as expected. This issue arises from an inappropriate implementation within the autofill feature, which is part of the Chromium open-source software that Microsoft Edge utilizes. The problem is addressed in the latest version, Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based) 118.0.2088.46, released on October 13, 2023, documented in KB-118.0.2088.46, ensuring that end users experience a seamless and secure browsing environment.
